titleStmt.title: Sanskrit Manuscripts in the Bodleian Libraries
titleStmt.funder: The cataloguing of this item was made possible through a benefaction from the late John P. Clay, founder and benefactor of the Clay Sanskrit Library.

msDesc.head: A composite manuscript containing eight manuscript works on vedānta, bound in the Bodleian Library.

binding.p: Early 20th-century red-brown textile binding over pasteboard, with shelfmark and description tooled in gold on the spine. Cardboard cover box.

history.acquisition: Donated by Mahārāja Chandra Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana in 1909.

recordHist.source: Description by Barbora Sojkova, based on observation of the manuscript and the unpublished card catalogue for otherwise-undescribed manuscripts, available in the Charles Wendell David Reading Room.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions). Contact specialcollections.enquiries@bodleian.ox.ac.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript.

listBibl.head: Other descriptions:
listBibl.bibl: Thomas Gambier-Parry and E. H. Johnston, Index Catalogue of MSS. Chandra Shum Shere, fol. 1

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Tantrasārasaṅgraha by Madhva, also known as Ānandatīrtha.

msItem.title: Tantrasārasaṅgraha
msItem.rubric: F. 3r (ff. 1r in original foliation): śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ || śrīhanumate namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 3r (ff. 1r in original foliation): jayatya[.]bhaveśaṃdravaṃditaḥ kamalāpatiḥ || anaṃtavibhavānaṃdaśaktitrānādisadgupaḥ ||
msItem.colophon: F. 7r (ff. 5r in original foliation): || iti śrīmad ānaṃdatīrtha bhagavatyādācāryaviracite śrīmattaṃtrasyārasaṃgrahe prathamodhyāyaḥ || śrīrāvasaṃvatsaubhya

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Library foliation in Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom right margin, recto.

additions.p: On f. 7v, a manuscript note ānaṃdatīrtha . taṃtrasārasaṃgraha 5 in black ink.
Occasional marginal and interlinear corrections in multiple hands, one of them being that of the scribe.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Adhyātmavidyopadeśavidhi.

msItem.title: Adhyātmavidyopadeśavidhi
msItem.rubric: F. 9r (ff. 1r in original foliation): śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 9r (ff. 1r in original foliation): athādhyātmavidhyopadeśavidhirlikhyate || saccidānaṃ dakaṃ dāyasarvadhīvṛtti sākṣiṇe ||
msItem.colophon: F. 38v (ff. 30v in original foliation): || iti śrī saṃkṣiptavedāṃtaśāstraitriyāyāṃ śrīmat paramahaṃsapari

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Library foliation in Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom right margin, recto.

layout.p: On ff. 9-25, the written area is framed by two marginal lines in red ink on each side.

additions.p: Abbreviation a°vi° written on the top left margin throughout the manuscript, above the original foliation.
Occasional marginal and interlinear corrections in multiple hands, one of them being that of the scribe.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Vedāntatattvāmṛta by Gopālendra Sarasvatī.

msItem.title: Vedāntatattvāmṛta
msItem.rubric: F. 40v (f. 1v in original foliation): || śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 40v (f. 1v in original foliation): oṃ ātmānamaṃ jasāvehmiprapaṃcopaśamaṃśivaṃ ||
msItem.colophon: F. 62r (f. 23r in original foliation): iti vedāṃtamṛtasaṃpūrṇa || śrībhavānīśaṃkarārpaṇamastu || śrīsitārāmacaṃdrārpaṇamastu || sake 1933 pramodanāmasaṃcahyere aśvinaśu kladdādaśyāṃ bhaumavāreṇarātrausaṃaptaḥ || śiva || kṛdma ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Library foliation in Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom right margin, recto.

layout.p: The written area is framed by three marginal lines in red ink on each side.

additions.p: On f. 40r, a manuscript note gopāleṃdrasarasvatōkṛta veddāṃtāmṛta in black ink.
On f. 40r, a manuscript note vedāṃtāmṛta in pencil.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Cidānandaślokī by Śaṅkarācārya, with the Siddhāntabindu by Mādhusudhana Sarasvatī.

msItem.title: Cidānandaślokī
msItem.rubric: F. 64v (ff. 1v in original foliation): śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 64v (ff. 1v in original foliation): śrī śaṃkarācāryanavāvatāraṃviśveśvaraṃ viśvaguruṃ praṇamya || vedotaśāstraśravaṇalasānāṃjodhāmakurvekamapiprayalaṃ || 1 ||
msItem.colophon: F. 90r (ff. 27r in original foliation): iti śrīmat paramahaṃsa parivrājakācārya śrī viśveśvara bhagavasūjyapādaśiṣya śrīmadhusūdanamunināviracitaḥ siddhāṃtabiṃduḥ samāptaḥ || śrīkāśīnāthaḥ prīyatāṃ || śrīḥ śrīḥ śrīḥ || cha || cha || cha || cha || cha ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Library foliation in Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom right margin, recto.
supportDesc.condition:
Detached corner of f. 66, loose and slotted in between leaves. Otherwise in good condition.
Complete.

additions.p: On f. 64r, a manuscript note athasiddhāṃtabiṃduprārambhaḥ || cha || 27 in black ink.
On f. 90v, a manuscript note iti siddhāṃtabiṃduḥ samāptaḥ || cha || in black ink.
Abbreviation si°bi° written on the top left margin throughout the manuscript, above the original foliation.
Rāma° written on the bottom right margin throughout the manuscript, above the original foliation.
Occasional marginal and interlinear corrections in same hand as that of the scribe.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Aparokṣānubhūti by Śaṅkarācārya,

msItem.title: Aparokṣānubhūti
msItem.rubric: F. 92v (f. 1v in original foliation): oṃ namo sadgurave ||
msItem.incipit: F. 92v (f. 1v in original foliation): śrī rāmaṃ paramānaṃdamupadeṣṭāramīśvaraṃ ||
msItem.explicit: F. 113r (ff. 22r in original foliation): || aparokṣānubhūtiḥ pūrṇā ||
msItem.colophon: F. 113v (ff. 22v in original foliation): iti śrīmadācāryaviracitā aparokṣānutiḥ samāptaḥ || śrīsadgurubhānuprakāśārpaṇasta || cha ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Library foliation in Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom right margin, recto.

layout.p: Abbreviation apa° written on the top left margin throughout the manuscript, above the original foliation.
Occasional marginal and interlinear corrections in same hand as that of the scribe.

handNote.desc: F. 113 includes a number of notes in a seemingly different hand.

decoDesc.decoNote: On f. 92, stamp in black ink with devanāgarī writing.

additions.p: On f. 92r, a manuscript note athācāryakṛtāparokṣanubhūtiḥ in black ink.
Occasional marginal and interlinear corrections in multiple hands, one of them being that of the scribe.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Aṣṭāvakra.

msItem.title: Aṣṭāvakra
msItem.rubric: F. 115v (f. 1v in original foliation): || oṃ namaḥ paramātmane ||
msItem.incipit: F. 115v (f. 1v in original foliation): muktimichasicetrātaviṣayānaviṣavatryajña | amārjavadayātoṣasatyaṃ pīyūṣavadbhajña | 1 ||
msItem.explicit: F. 145r (f. 31r in original foliation): || ityāṣṭavakrasaṃkhyākramavyākhyānaṃ smāptaṃ ||
msItem.colophon: F. 145v (f. 31v in original foliation): smāptoyaṃ jṇānaṃ dasamuddayoyaṃ graṃthaḥ || etadadhyetṛṇāṃca ātmajñānamastraḥ || || svaśrīsaṃvat 1932 varṣe bhāḍpasasitāt 3 tṛtīyāgurudine ayyeduśrīvṛddhanagarevāstavya ābhyataranāgarajñāti upāśāmajīsutakeśavajīkenyaliṣitamidaṃ || oṃ paravrahya enmaḥ || śubhamstrasarvajagat || śodhītaṃ ||

supportDesc.foliation: Library foliation in Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom right margin, recto.

layout.p: The written area is framed by three to four marginal lines in black ink on each side.

additions.p: On f. v, a manuscript note mīmāṃsāvākaprakāsa 91 in black ink.
The written area is framed by three to four marginal lines in black ink on each side.
Occasional marginal and interlinear corrections in multiple hands, one of them being that of the scribe.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of a Vedānta text labelled as Dattātreyavedānta.

msItem.title: Dattātreyavedānta
msItem.rubric: F. 147v (f. 1v in original foliation): śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ || dattatreyāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 147v (f. 1v in original foliation): kvacityāgīkvacidbhogīkvacinnagraḥ piśācavat ||
msItem.colophon: F. 163r (ff. [27]r in original foliation): iti śrīdattātrayabhagavatkvatevedāṃ taśāstresvātmasaṃvisupadeśeniśaṃjanatāmasaptamaḥ saṃdheyaḥ || śrīrastu || likhitaṃ bhaṭagopīnāthena idaṃ[.]thaṃ samāpte || śrīḥ || śrīḥ || śrīḥ || śrīḥ ||

supportDesc.foliation: Library foliation in Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom right margin, recto.
supportDesc.condition:
In good condition. Some edges are frayed with woodworm-damage, but without any loss of text.
Incomplete. Extant folios .

layout.p: The written area is framed by one to towmarginal lines in black ink on each side.

additions.p: On f. 147r, a later manuscript note dattātreyavyedāntā in blue ink.
On f. 163v, a later manuscript note śrīvāsudevāśramavapajñārya [?] in black ink.
Occasional marginal and interlinear corrections in multiple hands, one of them being that of the scribe.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Pañcīkaraṇavārtika by Sureśvāra.

msItem.title: Pañcīkaraṇavārtika
msItem.rubric: F. 165v (f. 1v in original foliation): śrī haraye namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 165v (f. 1v in original foliation): oṃ namo vrastādibhyovrastavighāsaṃpradāyakrartṛbhyovaṃśarṣibhyojamogurubhyaḥ ||
msItem.explicit: F. 170v (f. 7v in original foliation): iti śrīsureśvarācāryakṛtaṃ paṃcīkaraṇavārttikaṃ samāptam || śrī ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Library foliation in Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom right margin, recto.

layout.p: The written area is framed by two marginal lines in red ink on each side.

additions.p: On f. 165r, a manuscript note pañcīkaraṇavārtika in blue ink.
